scene_description_enriched: The image is divided into four panels, each depicting a saint or religious figure within an architectural setting. The top left panel shows a tonsured monk in a black habit, holding a staff and a book. The top right panel features a bishop in full regalia, including a mitre and cope, holding a crozier and blessing. The bottom left panel illustrates a figure in a red and blue robe, holding a vial of yellow liquid, with a young boy standing before them. The bottom right panel depicts a figure in a blue robe, holding a jar and an instrument, attending to a kneeling figure. All panels feature patterned backdrops and arched windows, suggesting an interior space.
